error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to media_entity_dreambroker.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
